text: Viktor Matveyev (born 21 May 1942) is a Russian equestrian. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male equestrians Category:Soviet male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Yekaterinburg
title: Viktor Matveyev
